# VS Code Extension - Perforce Annotate

This VS Code extension provides a one-click command to run Perforce annotate on the currently active file.

## Features
- Run p4 annotate command on active file
- Automatically opens the generated blame file
- Works only on files in Perforce workspace

## Development
- Project Type: VS Code Extension
- Language: TypeScript
- Target: Files in Perforce depot only
